transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Horns of the Destroyer

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Rippers of the Destroyer

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells dispatch a spider to spy on your foes, increasing your Intellect by 75 per report received. Stacks up to 40 times. This effect may only occur every 6 sec.
Use: Use your accumulated knowledge to strike when the time is right, granting 695 Intellect per report for 20 sec and consuming their passive effect. (20 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,401 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 114,224 Nature damage over 8 sec.

item.name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
